Dead By Daylight is an awesome multiplayer game!The Objective (As a Survivor) is to repair all 5 generator and open the exit gates in order to escape (Alternatively you can open the hatch that spawns when you  are either the last survivor alive or 2 generators are left to be repaired,keep in mind that if you aren't the only person left on the team the hatch will require a  key to open,as when you are the last person standing the hatch will be open).Survivors can take up to 2 hits before being incapacitated when you are hit once you are put into injured state,the killer can track your scratch marks that you leave when running and you emit moaning noises that will make you easier to locate,when into dying state you are on the ground and can either recover (but not fully unless you have the UNBREAKABLE Perk) or move around but very slowly.When you are almost fully recovered other survivors need to help you.Also when you are in the dying state the killer can pick you up and put you on a sacrificial hook (there are many around the map),while on the hook you can attempt an escape but i wouldn't recommend it because that will only speed up the entity appearing.The second time you are hooked the entity will appear and you will need to  keep pressing SPACE (or the button you put struggling on) or the entity will kill you.The third time you are hooked you are DEAD (Sacrificed).While working on generators you will come across a SKILL CHECK,press space at the moment where the arrow is at the white or the outlined gray line and you will complete the skill check BUT if you miss it the generator will explode,notifying the killer AND lose a tiny bit of the repair progress.Same goes for healing teammates!(except the fact that teammates don't explode.they just scream).Keep in mind that when you are near the killers TERROR RADIUS you will hear heartbeats the louder and faster they get,the closer the killer is!When playing as the killer your objective is to prevent the survivors from repairing the generators and escaping by sacrificing them (or killing them).As I said you will need to hit survivors 2 times in order to down them,afterwards you can pick them up and put them on a hook (please don't camp).Just like survivors killers have different abilities and perks to assist them!If you see a generator that has been not fully repaired and for some reason abandoned by survivors(because they heard your terror radius) you can kick the generator in order to damage it.When the generator is damaged it will slowly lose repair progress over time.I forgot to mention that when you pick up a survivor they can STRUGGLE by pressing A and D.If a survivor has finished struggling you will be stunned and they will escape.Survivors can hide into lockers too so you should check them when you have the chance to!When survivors run they will leave behind bright red scratch marks that you can use to track them,keep in mind that while walking or crouching they will not leave scratch marks.The survivors also have some items at their disposal that they can find if they search chests or get them in the blood web those items include:Toolboxes (used to repair generators faster or sabotage your hooks which leaves the unusable for a short period of time) Medkit (used to heal..duh) Key (you can open a hatch) a map or a flashlight (used to BLIND the killer).The survivors can use the flashlight the blind you and if they do you wont be able to see anything for a really short period of time and if they blinded you while you were carrying a survivor you will drop him.The survivors can also drop pallets on you to slow you down,you will need to press SPACE in order to break the pallet.That is mostly it i will explain more about the game if  i'm bored.

O jogo tem uma proposta excelente, principalmente pelo fato de você poder ser o "monstro" ao invés da vítima, diferentemente dos demais jogos de terror. Mas o que me atraiu e me fez compra-lo foi o fato de você poder jogar com slashers de filmes clássicos como Michael Myers, Leatherface, Freddy Krueger, Ghostface, entre outros (falta o Jason pra fechar e ficar perfeito hehehe); isso porque sempre fui fã de filmes clássicos de terror, lendas urbanas e outros jogos de terror.

Mas em contrapartida, o jogo ainda tem muito o que melhorar mecanicamente falando, é repleto de bugs e problemas no servidor, quedas de conexão, problema no matchmaking. O sistema de ranks é muito zoado, porque nem sempre ele é justo e não são baixas as chances de um novato cair com/contra um experiente, além de ser relativamente fácil você chegar no rank máximo. Ainda mais por ser um jogo competitivo assimétrico, há muito desbalanceamento.

Sobre a comunidade, é basicamente igual a qualquer comunidade de jogos PVP online, com uma considerável quantidade de jogadores tóxicos. O que costuma acontecer nesse jogo são jogadores reclamarem de como você joga, porque mesmo você não quebrando nenhuma regra, muitos jogadores podem te xingar por causa da maneira que você joga, há um conceito de "regras imaginárias". Então não fique surpreso se reclamarem de como você joga, principalmente se você for jogar de assassino.

Conclusão: O jogo é legal, tem uma proposta interessante e até mesmo inovadora, mas precisa muito o que melhorar.

Dead by Daylight - это затягивающая онлайн игра про 4х выживших и маньяка. Цели двух сторон очевидны, выжившим спастись и сбежать а маньяку убить всех. Игра затянет вас прокачкой персонажей, возможностью экспериментировать с навыками и стремление получение высшего ранга. У каждого персонажа своя история и 3 уникальных навыка, что заставляет нас покупать их и прокачивать до максимума. Игра поддерживается и развивается благодаря своей аудиторией. К сожалению в каждой игре есть свои нюансы и эта не за исключением. Так это зависания во время игры и недоработки. Советую поиграть, особенно с другом, так вы не соскучитесь. Но будьте готовы к токсичным игрокам, которые будут над вами издеваться и унижать))) Желаю вам удачи и успехов в этой замечательной игре!

This game is a ton of fun. So far I've mostly played killer, and I really enjoy the learning curve and high skill ceiling with some of the cast. The one thing that makes this game worth playing is the community!

The dbd community in general is full of pathetic, entitled, and immature crybabies. The concept of both playing for fun and playing to win seems to be something that the community deems impossible. Survivor mains seem to have their own made up set of rules for how YOU should play the game to their benefit. This is one of the few games that I've played where you could legit just be trying to play the game and have fun, but also wanting to win and you get called "sweaty" or "toxic".

So why is the community the best part of the game? Well really it's not, but it's always entertaining to come across the entitled brat playerbase when you win or lose.

Oyun genel olarak zevkli, zaman geçirebilirsiniz ama stres olup sinirlenebileceğiniz çok fazla durum mevcut. Katil oynuyorsanız 4 arkadaş oyuna girip oyununuzu zehir edebilir, neden özellikle arkadaşlar bunu başarıyor, çünkü solo oynayan survivorlarda takımda iletişim kurma mevcut değil, arkadaşlar voice comms ile organize olup her şeyinize engel oluyorlar. Üstüne birde saygısızlık yapmaları cabası. Eğer survivor oynuyorsanız da oyunu bilmeyen 1 kişi 3 kişinin kaybetmesine sebebiyet verebiliyor çünkü organize olmak çok çok önemli.Survivor'un nerede ne yapması gerektiğini çok iyi bilmesi lazım, 1 saniye zaman kaybında bile oyunu verebilirsiniz. Killer tarafından asılırsınız, survivorların kafasına esmez kurtarmaya gelmezse kaybetmiş olursunuz. Böyle yanları da var. Ama genel olarak ben stresi kaldırabilirim derseniz eğlenceli olduğu zamanlar da var.
